alert.note: Alert for Baker; Decatur; Grady; Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 7:32PM EDT until July 08 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 732 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Newton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vada, Hoggard Mill, Branchville, Hopeful and Harrells Still. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
